description: Try our easy to follow Prawn Wonton Soup recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Prawn Wonton Soup Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 300g cooked tiger prawns, shelled, deveined, finely chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Soak mushrooms in boiling water for 10 minutes until soft. Squeeze out excess water and finely chop.
In a medium bowl, combine prawn, mince, shallots, ginger, garlic, sesame oil and mushrooms.

Place a heaped teaspoon of prawn mixture in the centre of each wonton wrapper. Brush edges with a little water. Fold in half to form a triangle. Firmly press edges of wonton wrappers to seal. Fold in half along long side and press points together. Cover with a damp cloth. Repeat with remaining wrappers and filling.
Combine stock in a large saucepan with 2 cups water, soy, rice wine and chilli. Bring to the boil and add wontons and buk choy. Cook for 5 minutes until wontons float to the surface.
Ladle into bowls and serve with extra shallot, chilli and a wedge of lemon.
